entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 20. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this morning. Local blowing snow this morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 47 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
